Lyric:
[by:左瞳冰]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:39.88]Rhythm of wings in the sky so high
[00:44.01]Music in my ears I can't wait to see
[00:48.64]I' m hiding in the grass death in my hands
[00:53.87]Surprise is my only defence
[01:18.60]My private war against wilderness
[01:23.08]Human mastermind versus animal instinct
[01:27.61]And when the flock settles I pass my sentence
[01:31.89]But none will die after the report
[01:37.91]They rise into the air and fly away
[01:45.03]But they will return
[01:49.56]And I am all alone
[01:54.24]Yeah, they will return
[01:58.82]Then I will revenge
[02:53.59]Yeah, they will return
[02:58.67]Then I will revenge
[03:02.85]Yeah, they will return
[03:07.90]Then I will revenge
[03:11.01]Still some day I'm hiding again
[03:15.53]Waiting for the sound of stroking wings
[03:20.06]And they will come spirit within
[03:24.44]And in same place I miss them again
[03:30.66]They rise into the air
[03:35.39]And fly away
[03:39.72]Yeah, they rise into the air
[03:44.80]But...they will return!
